meanings.definition: Able to be represented or illustrated in a diagram.
meanings.sent1: The concept was so diagrammable that even the youngest students understood it.
meanings.sent2: The data was easily organized into a diagrammable format for analysis.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog was so diagrammable that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a beautifully diagrammable map, easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The instructions were made diagrammable with colorful illustrations.

meanings.definition: Capable of being visually depicted in a diagram.
meanings.sent1: The complex process was not very diagrammable and required a lot of explanation.
meanings.sent2: The relationship between the variables was clearly diagrammable on the chart.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a flying pig was so diagrammable that it sparked creativity.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like a diagrammable puzzle, waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The steps were made diagrammable with clear diagrams and labels.
